title: National Trust Easter Trails Wales
titleCy: Llwybrau Pasg yr Ymddiriedolaeth Genedlaethol Cymru

dates.note: Usually mid-March to mid-April, including Easter weekend

location.name: Erddig Hall and Garden
location.note: Flagship venue shown - trails at multiple NT Wales properties

description: National Trust Easter Trails bring family-friendly fun to historic houses, gardens, and landscapes across Wales during the spring holidays. Children can embark on exciting outdoor adventures, solving puzzles, tackling challenges, and following trails to claim their chocolate reward. Properties like Erddig, Bodnant Garden, Powis Castle, and Dyffryn Gardens each offer unique trails set within stunning grounds. Activities might include natural play areas, craft sessions, storytelling, and wildlife spotting alongside the egg hunts. It's the perfect way to enjoy Wales' most beautiful heritage sites while keeping children entertained with age-appropriate quests. Many properties also host additional seasonal activities throughout the Easter break.

heroImage.alt: Children on Easter trail in National Trust garden

pricing.note: Trail fee plus normal admission; free for NT members (trail fee may still apply)

accessibility.note: Accessibility varies by property - check individual venues
